fields.title: Support Mailmap
fields.body:
There was an [inquiry] on the mailing list about support for [mailmap].

[inquiry]: https://groups.google.com/d/msg/gitblit/Od7QaaySkDw/JADJHhlI57kJ
[mailmap]:https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/git-shortlog.html
